Title: The Boxtrolls
Writer: Irena Brignull (screenplay), Adam Pava (screenplay), Alan Snow (novel), Anthony Stacchi (story adapted by), Phil Dale (story adapted by), Vera Brosgol (additional writing)
Actors: Steve Blum, Dee Bradley Baker, Max Mitchell, Ben Kingsley
Plot: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 59 nominations.
